text: The name Nancy [ nan-see; French nahn-see ] is a female given name. It comes off Hannah, meaning "grace". The name was originally a nickname for girls. However, from the 18th century onward, Nancy became a proper name. This name was ranked #945 on the US Popular Names in 2021. == People == * Nancy Reagan, First Lady of the United States (1981â€”1989) * Nancy Cartwright, American actress * Nancy Pelosi, American politician (born 1940) * Nancy Kerrigan, American figure skater (born 1969) ==References== Category:Given names
title: Nancy (given name)
